00046 #define TWI_IDLE 0
00047 #define TWI_ADDRESS 2
00048 #define TWI_DATA_PHASE 3
00049 #define TWI_START 0x08
00050 #define TWI_REPEATED_START 0x10
00051 #define MT_SLA_ACK 0x18
00052 #define MT_SLA_NACK 0x20
00053 #define MT_DATA_ACK 0x28
00054 #define MT_DATA_NACK 0x30
00055 #define MR_SLA_ACK 0x40
00056 #define MR_SLA_NACK 0x48

00063 #define ATOMIC_TRANSACTION 0
00064 #define WRITE_TRANSACTION 1
00065 #define READ_TRANSACTION 2
00066 
00068 #define TWI_CONTROL (_BV(TWINT) | _BV(TWEN) | _BV(TWIE))
00069 #define TWI_STOP (_BV(TWINT) | _BV(TWEN) | _BV(TWSTO)
00070 
00071 #define BUFFER_SIZE 0x20
00072 
00073 /* Convenience macros (we don't use them all) */
00074 #define  _BV(bit) (1 << (bit))
00075 #define  inb(sfr) _SFR_BYTE(sfr)
00076 #define  inw(sfr) _SFR_WORD(sfr)
00077 #define  outb(sfr, val) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) = (val))
00078 #define  outw(sfr, val) (_SFR_WORD(sfr) = (val))
00079 #define  cbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) &= ~_BV(bit))
00080 #define  sbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) |= _BV(bit))
00081 
00082 #endif
